author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: رِضاكَ، وَإِنَّكَ أَنْتَ المُقَدَّسُ عَمَّا سِواكَ وَإِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الشَّافِي الكَافِي الحافِظُ الغَفُورُ الرَّحِيمُ.
translation: Thou, in truth, art immensely exalted above all else except Thyself. Thou art, verily, the Healer, the All-Sufficing, the Preserver, the Ever-Forgiving, the Most Merciful.
